Steps.section_description: Get access to setting up and launching trading bots for automated cryptocurrency trading
Steps.step1_description: Connect your exchange to Janym via Fast API in a couple of clicks
Steps.step2_description: Create your own bot or copy ready-made settings
Steps.step3_description: Launch the bot and it will start trading 24/7

FAQ.answer1: We take a 20% commission only on net profit, but no more than 50 USD per month. If there is no profit, you pay nothing.
FAQ.answer2: Yes. We do not store your funds. All money remains in your exchange account, and the bot works through API keys with limited permissions.
FAQ.answer3: Currently supported are Binance, OKX, Bybit, Kucoin, Kraken and many others (over 15 exchanges).
FAQ.question4: Do I need to constantly monitor the bot?
FAQ.answer4: No, the bot works in the cloud 24/7. You can monitor statistics at any time through your personal account.
FAQ.answer5: Yes, upon registration you get $5 on your balance for testing. You will start paying commission only after the bot earns you real money.
